Ice::
She smiled as the objects floated around the room. She then 
carefully, set everything down where is was supposed to be. She 
slowly drifted off to sleep in the corner. But as she slept, her 
dreams seamed to come alive in the room.  She dreamed of sparring 
with Lunarpine in the forest like she used to.  

In the lab, two drones that were laying in the corner suddenly stood 
up. They started to spar right there in the lab.  One tried to pounce 
on the other and showed actions that resembled a wolf's actions. The 
other flapped it arms and simulated owl like trates.  The drones 
wrestled and sparred.  The one that represented Lunarpine put it's 
front arms out and stuck it's backside in the air and wiggled it like 
it was wagging a tail. The other that represented Ice/ShadowWing 
flapped it's arms and stood there a few feet away from the other 
drone. It then folded it's arms under like folding wings. Then the 
owl drone jumped and landed on the wolf drone.

They rolled and tussled on the lab floor. All the while, Ice dreamed 
of the fun times of sparring with Lunarpine.
